scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn firebaserc && parcel build --no-content-hash --no-cache --no-source-maps --detailed-report 0
scripts.build:dev: yarn clean && yarn firebaserc && parcel watch --no-content-hash --no-cache --no-source-maps --detailed-report 0
scripts.deploy: yarn build && cross-env GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="../../service-account.json" firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:emulate: yarn build:dev & sleep 5 && cross-env GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="../../service-account.json" firebase emulators:start --only hosting
scripts.clean: rimraf dist misc/firebaserc.d.ts misc/firebaserc.d.ts.map misc/firebaserc.js misc/firebaserc.js.map misc/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
